positive.review: very nice game, music, and characters. really immersive!
This is very Classic. I loved this game since I was young and gameplay still rocks!
nice classic mmorpg good for chill gaming and nostalgia
still good and nostalgic, except i always ignored by other player when ask to join party T_T
I remember the tantra days before because I've played this game as a pioneer player
Much more stable server and GMs are quick to fix bugs
cant log.in in to the game. what should i do?
highly recomended .... god bless to all,happy gaming
Best Tantra private server I ever played with
bkit nawala ang weapon ko bow 68 +7 kay nag upgrade ako to +8? so sad!!!!
i love the game very nostalgic

good
nice
Can see your legs.
i cant login

If want to relive the early 2000’s RPG you can play this game. Just expect Filipino toxicity and a little bit of drama. I like how this game brought me back remembering the simple life I used to live. I hope the developers will find more ways to encourage new players to come and join the experience.

If you're an Old Player of kathana Tantra wayback 20 Years ago, specifically 2005, you will Definitely love  reliving the nostalgic feels how an "Old School Server" was like during the past 20 Years...

What you will appreciate in this Server is How you will take importance on Every Weapon, Armors and other item as you level up in every different level Phase... Yes its Hard to Level up unlike like any "Over-Powered Fast-Pacing Servers" we've played during the past, but those overpowered Items and fast Pacing Leveling is what steals the Joy and make the Game Boring and Ended up the Servers Destroyed...

But Now KATHANA, the new OLD SCHOOL SERVER will give you an experience of how was Kathana TANTRA was like During the Past 20 Years..

So Create your Account Now, Make Friends and Join a Guild and Level up in KALIA DUNGEON with your GUILD MATES and FRIENDS.... 

No Need to Level up and Play Alone... PLAY ENJOY & INTERACT !!
very nice game, music, and characters. really immersive!
Need more improvement but best classic game
i liked the game and im happy for playing it. and fix the minor bug
fun lil old school mmo. expect to play alone for the most part tho -1
nice classic mmorpg good for chill gaming and nostalgia
I hope the resu price for 80% Puranas will reduce the price and give it away as a freebies
still good and nostalgic, except i always ignored by other player when ask to join party T_T
I remember the tantra days before because I've played this game as a pioneer player
i hope developer fix the bug so i cannot disconnected too often and i hope i got lucky that someone buying my stuff at mandara market

Fixed an issue where some laptops with hybrid GPUs defaulted to integrated graphics instead of the dedicated GPU
How to set this? still Intel Iris -_- . not my dedicated GPU.

negative.review: No server in Europe. ;)))))))))))))))))))))
"Game time exceeded.  Game has ended"  well alright then
stupid EOS failed

A rehash of a twenty year old game. Very toxic GM who tells the players they shouldn't be there. While it is a free to play game, you would have to spend a considerable amount of money just to progress and get ahead. Many players have left.

Level 30 up is a pain, make the quest exp big enough to level up players, other than that there is nothing more to do than just grinding, unfortunately spots are full of KP players. GM are lazy not working

This basically just straight up wasting time to play this game, legit player grinding for hours and while some are doing KP (which is auto leveling with 3rd apps) and the dev allowed this. Some lower spot level are full with afk player so its no use to ask to join their party.
I don't remember this game this annoying. This server is  sucks, constant dc, and yes i have good connection
There is a bug where I can't click the option and cannot equip weapon. It's been 10 minutes and I hate it already. Not to mention that the patcher is crap as hell. Extremely disappointed

Changing screen resolutions wasn't possible, couldn't get full screen. restarted game because changed graphic settings and game said you had to do this for that to take effect; was unable to log back into game. Change PC option takes you to a black screen and a 15 second timer that you can't cancel, hope devs will change this.
No server in Europe. ;)))))))))))))))))))))
"Game time exceeded.  Game has ended"  well alright then
always DC!!!!!
stupid EOS failed
